/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in vibrant hues of red and white, reflecting the traditional architectural style of the region. The buildings are adorned with balconies and ornate details, adding to their charm. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the buildings.
